snippet: “Kisses on the Bottom,” an album of standards by Paul McCartney, is a jaunty tip of the hat to the pop music of his parents’ generation.
abstract: Stephen Holden reviews Paul McCartney's album Kisses on the Bottom; Nate Chinen reviews Tim Berne's album Snakeoil; Ben Ratliff reviews Oren Ambarchi's album Audience of One.

byline.original: By STEPHEN HOLDEN, NATE CHINEN and BEN RATLIFF

lead_paragraph: “Kisses on the Bottom,” an album of standards by Paul McCartney, is a jaunty tip of the hat to the pop music of his parents’ generation.

headline.seo: Paul McCartney’s ‘Kisses on the Bottom,’ Featuring Standards
